content: If the 16th-century chess genius was the Spaniard Ruy López, and the main character of 17th-century chess was played by the Italian Greco, the undisputed 18th-century star in Caissa's domain was the Frenchman Philidor.
translations: ita:Se il genio degli scacchi del XVI secolo fu lo spagnolo Ruy López, e la figura di spicco degli scacchi nel XVII secolo f
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
